testcase.name: end-to-end test to purchase some devices
testcase.system-out: Given I am on homepage......................................................passed When I click on laptop button...............................................passed And I select and add a laptop to cart.......................................passed When I click on Monitors button.............................................passed And I select and add a monitor to cart......................................passed And I go to cart and verify the order.......................................passed And I press the place order button..........................................passed When I fill the place order form............................................passed And I press Purchase button.................................................passed Then Order is place successfully............................................passed
